mapper.select: select b.id,title,DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y.%m.%d') createDate,username,nickname,text,markdown FROM `blog` b,`user` u where b.state_id = 1 and u.id = b.user_id order by create_date desc

select b.id,title,DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y.%m.%d') createDate,username,nickname,text,markdown FROM `blog` b,`user` u where b.state_id = 1 and u.id = b.user_id and b.title LIKE concat("%",#{title},"%") order by create_date desc
select b.id,b.title,DATE_FORMAT(b.create_date,'%Y.%m.%d') createDate,b.text,u.username,nickname from `blog` b,`user` u where b.user_id = u.id and b.id = #{id}
select *,DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y.%m.%d') createDate from `blog` b, `user` u where b.user_id = u.id and username = #{username} order by b.create_date desc

select b.id,b.title,DATE_FORMAT(b.create_date,'%Y.%m.%d') createDate,u.username from `like_data` l ,`user` u,`blog` b where u.id = l.user_id and b.id = l.blog_id and u.id = #{userId} order by l.create_date desc

select b.id,b.title,DATE_FORMAT(b.create_date,'%Y.%m.%d') createDate,u.username from `favorite` l ,`user` u,`blog` b where u.id = l.user_id and b.id = l.blog_id and u.username = #{username} order by l.create_date desc
